title: Why ATS-Friendly Resumes Matter in 2025
excerpt: Beat the bots: structure, keywords, and clean formatting to pass screening.
content: An ATS-friendly resume uses clean headings, consistent fonts, and role-specific keywords. Focus on measurable impact (e.g., reduced processing time by 30%). Avoid tables and heavy graphics. Use a master resume and tailor for each role.

title: Top UAE Hiring Trends This Year
excerpt: Skills in demand, visa updates, and how to stand out in Dubai/Abu Dhabi.
content: UAE hiring emphasizes digital, compliance, and customer experience roles. Employers value candidates with GCC exposure, strong communication, and certification-backed skills. Network with recruiters, optimize LinkedIn, and keep your CV UAE-format ready.

title: Ace Your Next Virtual Interview
excerpt: STAR answers, portfolio proof, and recruiter follow-ups that get replies.
content: Use the STAR method: Situation, Task, Action, Result. Prepare impact examples, test your tech, and keep answers crisp. Close with a value recap and a polite follow-up within 24 hours.
